name: Familiar-Possessed - Aussa
text: You can send 1 "Aussa the Earth Charmer" and 1 EARTH monster you control to the Graveyard to Special Summon this card from your hand or Deck. If you do, this card gets the following effect: â—? During battle between this attacking card and a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the ATK of this card, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent.
